description:
Wakasa is shocked when Tatsumi leans over the tub and announces it stinks. Tatsumi cleans the tub responsible for the odor and transfers Wakasa to a children`s pool. Saying, "Brother, tell me if you`re using the pool," Kasumi mistakes Wakasa for Tatsumi and hugs him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハダカのお付き合い事情
